Caught by the fox beastkin after distracting her, the
shrunken dragon rider, Alain, was separated from his
partner and trapped inside the shinobi's mouth.
Rolled around by her tongue like a piece of candy, his
cries for help were muffled by the smacking of her lips
and the thick mask covering the fox girl's mouth.
The girl had already made the decision to not return
him to Gale after the battle ended. His fate had been
sealed to either become a snack or a meal - destined
either way to be swallowed up by the beastkin girl.
